textLabeling: At first grab a printed label and put it on the side of the roll
textScanning: Scan barcode from sticked label and pull the scan-trigger
textRating: Determine the quality of the roll
validationErrorBarcode: Barcode entry is missing. Please select field and scan barcode.
validationErrorRating: Your rating is missing. Please select quality.
modalParagraph: The process has been paused. Do you want to end if prematurely?
